items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Southern Cal
items.summary: It’s mid-October during an odd year, so that means we get all of the majesty of a Midwestern autumn, as well as another round of Notre Dame versus USC. The Battle for the Jeweled Shillelagh is upon us, and it might be the last one for some time. While Marcus Freeman remains confident that the […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Hot and Cold Takes VS the USC Trojans
items.summary: How’d We Do Last Week? Wildly Inaccurate Honestly it was an incredibly clean week. There were no glaring wrong. Strong showing everyone Most Interesting These were simply incredible. I was VERY happy to find out that for a couple quarters I was able to watch on NBC, before it switching back to the Cock. Most […]

items.title: Irish vs USC for the Jeweled Shillelagh — that means it’s TROJAN BLOOD WEEK
items.summary: It’s that time again for Notre Dame Football fans all over the country (the world, really). It’s time to break out the Trojan Blood to sanctify the greatest intersectional rivalry in college football — Notre Dame VS Southern Cal. USC is having a fairly good season up to this point, and they are developing hopes and dreams […]
